modName: Meteorite Blast and Magnificent Silver Sword Spells
summary: This mod places 2 spell books on a table in the Arch Mage quarters, at the College of Winterhold.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][b]CHANGELOG 1.1[/b][/color]
[color=yellow][b]==============[/b][/color]
- Fixed Meteorite inventory icon so the textures show up properly
- Changed Magnificent Silver Sword, It flys through the air vertically now(this removes the airplane look when casting the spell)
 [color=orange]SEE NEW SWORD PROJECTILE SCREENSHOT[/color]

NOTE: Video is not updated to show changes in the Magnificent Silver Sword projectile.

[color=yellow][b]WHAT THIS MOD DOES[/b][/color]

This mod places 2 spell books on a table in the Arch Mage quarters, at the College of Winterhold.


[color=yellow][b]THE SPELLS[/b][/color]

Magnificent Silver Sword - Projects a massive silver sword and inflicts 67 points damage on impact

Meteorite Blast - Projects a deadly flaming meteorite, it inflicts 75 points of damage on impact

[youtube]s8JsT7TmeRM&list=UUStaxl92nX935JWv16InxNw&index=1&feature=plcp[/youtube]

[color=yellow][b]INSTALL[/b][/color]

Option 1: Use Nexus Mod Manager to install this mod for you automatically

Option 2: Manually install by unzipping the compressed file, then placing the contents of the folder
          into Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim directory
          Then check off the new .esp in the Data section when you first start your game.


[color=yellow][b]UN-INSTALL[/b][/color]

Option 1: Use Nexus Mod Manager to un-install automatically

Option 2: Manually remove the installed folder from the meshes and texture directories located in the
          Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data directory. Then remove the installed .esp
         


[color=yellow][b]CREDITS[/b][/color]

clintmich - Mod Author

Bethesda - For another great game and the Creation Kit

Gamers - For downloading, endorsing, and playing the mods I create. Kudos to all of you!

My Girlfriend - For putting up with my many hours of modding(She hates it when I credit her, but I am anyway)

Nifskope - For an awesome free 3D model editor

Blender Foundation - For an awesome free 3D modeling program

And special thanks to Nexus Sites for the wonderful modding community they provide!

Thank You!

clintmich
2012
version 1.0
author: clintmich
